name: Bad Snake
description:
BAD SNAKE
It's like regular snake, but objectively worse!

Whenever you eat a red square, there is a chance your snake will split, creating another controllable snake. If any snake collides, it's game over.

Screen wraps around, so don't worry about hitting the sides. You also snakes can't hit themselves!

Controls:

WASD/Arrows/D-Pad/Analog Stick

If you got some form of entertainment out of this, it would be awesome if you hit the support button :)
